articles.content: We havent seen the device on sale for less than $1,500 before today since its launch earlier in the summer, so this is quite the offer. The higher-capacity 512GB variant of the Samsung phone is also … [+871 chars]

articles.author: TN Tech Desk
articles.title: Zebronics Ventures into the Laptop Segment with India’s First Dolby Atmos-Enabled Series - Times Now
articles.description: Zebronics enters the competitive laptop market with the launch of its Pro Series Y and Z, becoming the first Indian brand to offer laptops with Dolby Atmos technology for an immersive audio experience.
